summary: Archaeologists defile the tomb of mummified Kharis, who was buried alive for falling in love with an Egyptian princess.
cast: Dick Foran|Peggy Moran|Wallace Ford|Eduardo Ciannelli|George Zucco|Cecil Kellaway|Charles Trowbridge|Tom Tyler|Sig Arno|Eddie Foster|Harry Stubbs|Michael Mark|Mara Tartar|Leon Belasco|Nick Borgani|James Crane|Jerry Frank|Zita Johann|Boris Karloff|Frank Lackteen|Murdock MacQuarrie|Anne G. Sterling|Ken Terrell
title: La mano de la momia
